import React from 'react'; import './IdentifyGoals.css'; // Create a CSS file for styling this component const IdentifyGoals = () => { return (

Identify Goals

The next step on the road to independence is identifying your goals and determining the options available to help you move forward in life. When you begin this journey, your counselor will play a crucial role in helping you explore and clarify your hopes and dreams. Through talk therapy or counseling sessions, you'll not only process your current emotions but also articulate your aspirations for the future.

What do you want to achieve? Is your goal to live independently? Do you wish to continue your education or re-enter the workforce? Whatever your ambitions, your counselor will work with you to develop a plan tailored to your needs. They will connect you with the resources and support necessary to take the steps toward achieving your goals.

This collaborative process ensures that you are not alone in navigating the path ahead. Your counselor's guidance will help you break down your goals into manageable steps, providing a clear roadmap to follow. With their support, you can gain the confidence and skills needed to pursue your dreams and lead a fulfilling life.

Listen to Ann's story:

External Resources for Different Age Groups:

  • Lighthouse Guild - Programs for Children
  • Helen Keller National Center - Programs for Adults
  • American Foundation for the Blind - Early Childhood Education
  • American Foundation for the Blind - Employment Services
  • National Federation of the Blind - Programs for Seniors
); }; export default IdentifyGoals;
